survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers on their experience with subscription-based coffee services, including satisfaction with delivery, product quality, and customer service.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to this coffee service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This helps segment respondents by their subscription duration.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to this coffee service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the coffee beans provided?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the coffee beans provided?

questions.question_text: How often do you receive deliveries from this service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How often do you receive deliveries from this service?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to this coffee service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. This helps identify key drivers for subscription.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to this coffee service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any improvements you would like to see in this coffee subscription service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any improvements you would like to see in this coffee subscription service.
